41 划分为 huàfēn wéi be divided into

一周四练 yī zhōusìliàn Practice four times a week

复天 fù tiān Futian

周日 zhōu rì sunday
休息 xiūxí rest
胸背一起给练了 xiōng bèi yīqǐ gěi liànle Chest and back are trained together
平板的卧推 píngbǎn de wò tuī flat bench press
自由重量 zìyóu zhòngliàng free weights
器械 qìxiè instrument
61 史密斯机 shǐmìsī jī Smith machine
肩胛收紧 jiānjiǎ shōu jǐn Tighten the shoulder blades
仰躺 yǎng tǎng lie on back
椅子 yǐzi Chair
卧推椅 wò tuī yǐ bench press
往中间 wǎng zhōngjiān to the middle
收一收 shōu yī shōu close up
双手垂直 shuāngshǒu chuízhí vertical hands
在身体的上方 zài shēntǐ de shàngfāng on top of the body
缓慢 huǎnmàn slow
71 往下放 wǎng xiàfàng put down
用力往上推 yònglì wǎng shàng tuī push up
不要歪掉 bùyào wāi diào don't crooked
手肘 shǒu zhǒu elbow
胸肌挤压 xiōngjī jǐ yā pectoral squeeze
强烈很多 qiángliè hěnduō much stronger
慢慢上升 màn man shàngshēng rise slowly
组间休息 zǔ jiān xiūxí rest between sets
恰好没有力气 qiàhǎo méiyǒu lìqì just have no strength
间歇 jiànxiē Intermittent
81 最后一组力竭 zuìhòu yī zǔ lì jié last set to failure
引体向上 yǐn tǐ xiàngshàng pull up
穿插着训练 chuānchāzhe xùnliàn interspersed with training
稍微 shāowéi a little
体息一下 tǐ xī yīxià take a breath
略宽握着吊杆 lüè kuān wòzhe diào gān Hold the boom slightly wider
身体挺直 shēntǐ tǐng zhí upright
用力拉上去 yònglì lā shàngqù pull up
不要耸肩 bùyào sǒngjiān don't shrug
相似 xiāngsì resemblance
91 上斜角度 shàng xié jiǎodù Incline angle
坐姿划船 zuòzī huáchuán seated rowing
双脚踩稳 shuāng jiǎo cǎi wěn keep your feet on
挺直腰背，核心收紧 tǐng zhí yāo bèi, héxīn shōu jǐn Keep your back straight and your core tight
把手 bǎshǒu handle
拉起来 lā qǐlái pull up
小幅度的摆动 xiǎo fúdù de bǎidòng small swing
使劲 shǐjìn hard
使劲往中间夹 shǐjìn wǎng zhōngjiān jiā squeeze in the middle
小伙伴 xiǎo huǒbàn buddy
101 跟不上了 gēn bù shàngle Can't keep up
体力 tǐlì physical strength
孤立动作 gūlì dòngzuò isolated action
龙门架 lóngmén jià Gantry
夹胸器械 jiā xiōng qìxiè Chest clamp
手臂的疲劳 shǒubì de píláo arm fatigue
辅助动作 fǔzhù dòngzuò Auxiliary action
收紧的状态 shōu jǐn de zhuàngtài Tightened state
每组可以做到力竭 měi zǔ kěyǐ zuò dào lì jié Each group can do to exhaustion
单臂哑铃划船 dān bì yǎlíng huáchuán One Arm Dumbbell Row
111 肌肉往后收缩 jīròu wǎng hòu shōusuō muscle back contraction
左右摇晃 zuǒyòu yáohuàng shake from side to side
拉伸一下 lā shēn yīxià stretch it
背阔肌 bèi kuò jī latissimus dorsi
大圆肌 dàyuán jī teres major
消耗很大 xiāohào hěn dà consumes a lot
糖原 táng yuán glycogen
尽快的补充 jǐnkuài de bǔchōng replenish as soon as possible
一根香蕉 yī gēn xiāngjiāo a banana
嫌麻烦 xián máfan Too much trouble
121 一杯增肌粉 yībēi zēng jī fěn 1 cup of muscle gainer
蛋白质 dànbáizhí protein
碳水化合物 tànshuǐ huàhéwù carbohydrate
到位的方法 dàowèi de fāngfǎ method in place

目标肌肉 mùbiāo jīròu target muscle

大家好，我是卓叔 Hello everyone, I am Uncle Zhuo
这里是我们的增重科普系列的第4个视频 Here is the 4th video in our weight gain science series
这个系列一共有8个视频 There are 8 videos in this series
可以系统全面的教会你增重的方法 Can systematically teach you how to gain weight
想要增重的瘦子可以先点击关注一波 Thin people who want to gain weight can first click to follow a wave
如果前面的增重课程还没有看过 If you haven't seen the previous weight gain courses
建议先从第1课开始按顺序看 It is recommended to start from the first can be read in order
我要干嘛？ What am I going to do?
很迷惘 very confused
看着大家练的千奇百怪 Watching everyone practice all kinds of strange things
关键是自己还看不太懂 The key is that I still don't understand
就更迷惘了 even more confused
别看了，今天我带你练练 Don't look, today I will take you to practice
这位一拳超人造型的肌肉男 The muscular man in the shape of One Punch Man
就是我们的技术指导范双一老师 It is our technical instructor Fan Shuangyi
之前和我们一起拍过线上课《增肌入门教学课》 I took the online class "Introduction to Muscle Gain" with us before
虽然他没有头发，但是其实他并不是秃头 Although he has no hair, he is not bald
你看他的发际线并不高 You see his hairline is not high
他只是一拳超人的死忠粉 He's just a diehard fan of One Punch Man
把自己剪成光头 cut yourself bald
那么来到健身房，先要做什么呢？ So when you come to the gym, what do you do first?
到更衣室放包 Put your bag in the locker room
顺便把衣服给换了 By the way, I changed my clothes
造一些透气舒服 Make some breathable and comfortable
适合动作的T恤和短裤 Action-friendly t-shirts and shorts
自己觉得舒服好看就行 Just feel comfortable and look good
像范老师这么大的 As big as Mr. Fan
没有适合的衣服 no suitable clothes
不穿其实也没有问题 It's okay if you don't wear it
但是像鞋子就比较讲究了 But shoes are more particular
不要穿慢跑鞋训练 Do not train in jogging shoes
就是这种鞋底很软的跑鞋 These are running shoes with soft soles.
因为你在训练的时候 because when you are training
双脚是要踩稳在地面上的 Your feet are supposed to be on the ground
鞋底太软的话 If the sole is too soft
身体就容易晃动 body shakes easily
动作就容易做不标准 Actions are easy to do non-standard
我们应该买这种鞋底比较硬的训练写 We should buy this kind of shoes with harder soles for training
或者帆布鞋的鞋底也很硬 Or the soles of canvas shoes are also very hard
或者不穿鞋也没有问题 Or don't wear shoes, no problem
手套可以考虑戴一个 Gloves may consider wearing one
可以防止起茧子 Can prevent calluses
有女朋友的都应该考虑戴上 Anyone with a girlfriend should consider wearing it
头戴式的大耳机也是可以考虑戴一个的 You can also consider wearing a large headset
听不听音乐没有关系 It doesn't matter whether you listen to music or not
主要是可以防止私教找你卖课 Mainly to prevent private trainers from asking you to sell lessons
然后带上一瓶运动饮料 and bring a sports drink
一条擦汗的运动毛巾 A sweat towel
你就可以开始练了 you can start practicing
在训练前 before training
大家可以慢跑5~10分钟进行热身 You can jog for 5-10 minutes to warm up
再对全身做一些简单的短时间拉伸 Do some short stretches all over your body
就像在学校上体育课做的那一套 Like the one you do in gym class at school
活动一下筋骨 exercise your muscles
我们就可以开始训练 we can start training
对于比较瘦的初学者来说 For beginners who are thinner
先不要做什么胸肩背腿 Don't do anything with your chest, shoulders, back and legs
这类分化这么细的训练 Such finely divided training
不适合你这个阶段 not suitable for your stage
效果更好的选择 better choice
应该是双分化双循环训练 It should be double-differentiated double-loop training
也就是说，我们把全身划分为两个部分 That is, we divide the whole body into two parts
每次只练其中一个部分 Practice one part at a time
例如说上半身和下半身 For example, upper body and lower body
然后一周四练 Then practice four times a week
这样每个都位每周就能够训练到两次 In this way, everyone can train up to twice a week.
训练容量和训练频率都有保障 Both training capacity and training frequency are guaranteed
对于新手来说增肌效果比较快的训练安排 For beginners, the training arrangement with faster muscle building effect
但是对于瘦子来说，要尽快显状 But for thin people, it is necessary to show up as soon as possible
我们应该按照容易看起来更壮的肌肉 We should follow easy to look bigger muscles
将全身肌肉这样划分 Divide the muscles of the whole body like this
躯干和四肢 torso and limbs
躯干主要就是胸部和背部这两块肌肉 The torso consists mainly of the chest and back muscles
胸背练大了 The chest and back have been strengthened
人就不会显得那么单薄 People won't look so thin
四肢主要是大腿，肩部和手臂 Extremities mainly thighs, shoulders and arms
这些都位复天特别容易露在衣服外面 These are especially easy to show outside the clothes
练壮了，比较容易突出肌肉感 When you are strong, it is easier to highlight your muscles
那么如果我们一周四练 So if we practice four times a week
例如说周一，周二，周四，周五都训练 For example, Monday, Tuesday, Thursday, and Friday
周三，周六，周日都休息的话 If Wednesday, Saturday, and Sunday are closed
那么我们周一周四就可以把胸背一起给练了 Then we can train the chest and back together on Monday and Thursday.
周二周五，先练大腿 On Tuesday and Friday, practice thighs first
然后把肩部和手臂给带上 Then bring the shoulders and arms
今天我们范老师来带大家练练胸背 Today, our teacher Fan will take you to practice chest and back
第一个动作 first action
我们先做一个平板的卧推类动作 Let's do a flat bench press first
例如说哑铃卧推 For example, dumbbell bench press
这个动作建议用自由重量 It is recommended to use free weights for this exercise
不要器械或者史密斯机 No machines or Smith machines
我们先把肩胛收紧 Let's tighten our shoulder blades first
仰躺在卧推椅上 lie on your back on a bench press
肩部再往中间收一收 Take your shoulders to the middle
双手垂直在身体的上方 hands vertically above the body
然后缓慢有控制地把哑铃往下放 Then lower the dumbbells slowly and in a controlled manner
放到最低点再用力往上推 Put it down and push it up
要注意小臂全称是垂直地面的，不要歪掉 It should be noted that the full name of the forearm is vertical to the ground, do not crooked
做的过程中 in the process of doing
可以想想把两边的手肘往中间来 You can think about bringing the elbows on both sides to the middle.
这样胸肌挤压的感觉会强烈很多 This will give you a much stronger chest squeeze.
大家不要觉得自己很瘦 Don't think you are skinny
哑铃太重推不起来 Dumbbells are too heavy to push
没有这回事 no such thing
10kg你推不起来 You can't push 10kg
你可以去找2kg的小哑铃开始推 You can find a small 2kg dumbbell and start pushing
练多了，你的力量就会慢慢上升 The more you practice, the more your strength will gradually increase
你就能推起更大的重量了 You can lift more weight
力量足够的同学 Classmates with enough strength
也可以考虑杠铃卧推 Also consider barbell bench press
哪个有感觉你就做哪个 Do whatever you feel
做四组，每组做8个左右 Do four sets of about 8 reps each
组间休息1~2分钟 Rest 1-2 minutes between sets
重量选择上 weight selection
控制在最后一组做完8个就恰好没有力气 Control in the last group to finish 8, just have no strength
就差不多了 almost
《组数：4组； "Number of groups: 4 groups;
次数：8次 Times: 8 times
间歇：1~2分钟 Interval: 1~2 minutes
练法：最后一组力竭》 Practice: The last set to exhaustion"
第二个动作 second action
我们做一个垂直下拉的背部动作 Let's do a vertical pull-down back movement
引体向上 pull up
新手的力量恢复水平还不太好 The strength recovery level of novices is not very good
这样子胸背穿插着训练 This way the chest and back are interspersed with training
可以让刚刚练完的肌肉 Can make the muscles that have just been trained
稍微先体息一下 take a rest
双手比肩部略宽握着吊杆 Hold the boom with hands slightly wider than shoulder width
身体挺直 upright
先把肩胛骨往下压 Press the shoulder blades down first
然后把整个身体用力拉上去 Then pull your whole body up
然后再缓慢在控制地往下放 Then lower it slowly and in a controlled manner
这里注意三个问题 Pay attention to three issues here
第一，拉起来的过程中不要耸肩 First, don't shrug your shoulders while pulling up
第二，身体不要往后仰太多 Second, don't lean back too much
第三，动作要尽量做完全程 Third, the action should be done as far as possible
不要只做半程 don't just do halfway
引体向上这个动作比较难 Pull-ups are more difficult
我们可以一共做多30个 We can do a total of 30 long
分几组做都没有关系 It doesn't matter how many groups you do
累了就体息一会 Take a rest when you are tired
如果你的体力不够 if your physical strength is not enough
是在拉不上去 I can't pull it up
也可以考虑先练高位下拉 You can also consider doing high pulldowns first.
动作要领和引体向上比较相似 Action essentials are similar to pull-ups
要特别注意小臂要垂直地面，不能歪掉 Pay special attention to the forearm to be vertical to the ground and not crooked
我们做四组，每组做12个左右 We do four groups, each group does about 12
组间体息1~2分钟 Rest for 1-2 minutes between groups
第三个动作，回到胸部 The third action, back to the chest
我们要做一个上斜角度的卧推类动作 we're going to do an upslope angle
这个动作对新手来说 This action is for novices
不太容易找到感觉 not easy to find the feeling
所以可以用杠铃哑铃 So you can use barbells and dumbbells
也可以用器械或史密斯机 can also be used with instruments or smith machines
同样先把肩胛骨收紧 Also tighten the shoulder blades first
仰躺在卧推椅上 lie on your back on a bench press
双手垂直放在身体上方 Place hands vertically above body
然后缓慢有控制地把哑铃往下放 Then lower the dumbbells slowly and in a controlled manner
放到最低点再用力地往上推 Lower it to the lowest point and push up hard
要注意小臂全程都是垂直地面的 Note that the forearm is all vertical to the ground.
不要歪掉 don't crooked
和上一个动作一样 Same as last action
做四组，每组做8个左右 Do four sets of about 8 reps each
组间体息1~2分钟 Rest for 1-2 minutes between groups
第四个动作，继续练背部 The fourth action, continue to practice the back
做一个水平后拉的背部动作，坐姿划船 Do a horizontal back pull, seated rowing
坐在凳子上，双脚踩稳 Sit on a stool with your feet firmly planted
挺直腰背，核心收紧 Keep your back straight and your core tight
用力把把手拉起来 pull the handle up
然后缓慢有控制地往下放 Then lower slowly and in a controlled manner
身体可能会有小幅度的摆动 There may be a slight movement of the body
但是要保持身体挺直 but keep your body upright
摆动的幅度也不要太大 Do not swing too much
要特别注意，往后拉的时候 Pay special attention when pulling back
背部要使劲往中间夹 The back should be squeezed in the middle
这样背部才能够练出感觉来 Only in this way can the back be able to practice the feeling
做四组，每组做12个左右 Do four sets of about 12 reps each
组间体息1~2分钟 Rest for 1-2 minutes between groups
好了，做完成四个动作 Well, do four actions
可能很多小伙伴的体力已经跟不上了 Maybe many of my friends can't keep up with their physical strength.
如果你感觉练不下去了 If you feel like you can't go on
那么你就先到这里就可以结束了 then you can end here first
但如果你体力还不错 but if you're healthy
我们还可以继续加两个孤立动作 We can continue to add two isolation actions
第一个是胸部的孤立动作，夹胸 The first is an isolation exercise for the chest, the chest clamp
用龙门架或者夹胸器械都可以做 It can be done with a gantry or a chest clamp
其实孤立动作对新手增肌来说帮助不算太大 In fact, isolated movements are not very helpful for beginners to increase muscle
但是可以帮助新手尽快找到 But it can help novices find as soon as possible
胸部肌肉挤压发力的感觉 Feeling of squeezed chest muscles
而且也不会增加手臂的疲劳 And it won't increase arm fatigue
作为辅助动作还是可以的 Can be used as an auxiliary action
要注意肩胛骨保持收紧的状态 Note that the shoulder blades remain tense
想看把手肘从两边往中间夹 I want to see the elbows pinched from both sides to the middle
胸肌就有感觉了 I can feel the chest muscles
做3个，每组可以做到力竭 Do 3, each group can do exhaustion
组间体息1分钟 Rest for 1 minute between sets
另一个是背部的单臂哑铃划船 The other is a one-arm dumbbell row for the back
这个其实算不上是孤立动作 This isn't really an isolation move.
但可以尽可能地让背部肌肉往后收缩 But you can let the back muscles contract as far as possible
找到挤压背部的感觉 Find out what it feels like to squeeze your back
也是有利于新手找感觉的训练 It is also good for beginners to find the training
要注意身体的稳定，不要左右摇晃 Pay attention to the stability of the body, do not shake from side to side
充分感觉肩部和背部往后移动的感觉 Fully feel the movement of the shoulders and back back
做3组，可以每组做到力竭 Do 3 sets, each set can be exhausted
组间体息1分钟 Rest for 1 minute between sets
好了今天的胸背训练动作就到这里 Well, that's all for today's chest and back training.
练完我们可以简单拉伸一下胸肌和背部肌群 After training, we can simply stretch the chest muscles and back muscles
放松一下 relax for a moment
拉伸胸肌 Stretch the pectoral muscles
拉伸背阔肌 Stretch the lats
拉伸中背部 Stretch the middle back
放松大圆肌 relax teres major
放松胸小肌 relax pectoralis minor
训练完消耗很大 It consumes a lot of training
特别是糖原，需要尽快的补充 Glycogen, in particular, needs to be supplemented as soon as possible
所以练后比较建议吃一两根香蕉或者面包 Therefore, it is recommended to eat one or two bananas or bread after training
都可以达到这个目的 can achieve this goal
嫌麻烦的话也可以直接和一杯增肌粉 If you find it troublesome, you can also directly drink a cup of muscle-building powder
蛋白质和碳水化合物就都补充上了 Both protein and carbohydrates are added
最后这里教给大家一个 Finally, I will teach you one
简单判断训练有没有到位的方法 A simple way to judge whether the training is in place
注意，不是判断增肌效果 Note that it is not to judge the effect of muscle gain
而是新手用来判断 It is used by novices to judge
训练有没有练到你想要练的肌肉？ Have you trained the muscles you want?
就是，肌肉酸痛 yes, muscle soreness
练完的第二天或者第三天 The second or third day after training
看看你的目标肌肉有没有明显的酸痛感 See if your target muscles are visibly sore
例如说你练胸肌 For example, if you train your chest muscles
如果说你的胸肌不痛，手臂很痛 Say your pectorals don't hurt but your arm hurts
那说明你胸部肌肉的收缩还不够好 That means your chest muscles aren't contracted well enough.
没有练到位，借力手臂了 I didn't practice well, I borrowed my arm
下次训练要重新调整下动作找感觉 Next time you train, you need to readjust your movements to find the feeling
如果说胸肌很酸痛 If the chest muscles are sore
至少可以说明 to say the least
你的胸肌是有被练到，没有练歪 Your pectoral muscles have been trained, not crooked
好的感谢大家收看 ok thank you for watching
